Text: i dont understand how to burn this to a dvd please help me!! can you burn this with nero????

If you download "vlc-player" (google it!) you'll be able 2 drag and drop the containing folder into the player and you'll get full movie with subtitles and language selections!

VLC-player is unarguably the best media-player i've ever tried. It's freeware, small and it opens ALL movies!
